summary: This code defines a class "AISqlPointer" that inherits from "AIPointer". It initializes the pointer with a given class and id, and includes two properties - pClass (string) for the pointer type and pId (integer) for the pointer address. The comments suggest it is used for managing database pointers in the SMG_NothingIsAll project.
